code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import Data from'./Data';import'./productDetailStyles.css';import{CartContext}from'./CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductDetail=()=>{const{title}=useParams();const{addToCart}=useContext(CartContext);const product=Data.find(product=>product.title===title);if(!product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Product not found"});}const handleAddToCart=()=>{addToCart(product);console.log("Added ".concat(product.title," to cart"));};const handleSelectColor=color=>{console.log("Selected color: ".concat(color));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.title,className:"prodct-detail-img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.des}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"color-selection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Available Colors:"}),product.color.map((color,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"color-button",style:{backgroundColor:color},onClick:()=>handleSelectColor(color)},index))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"size-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Available Sizes:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:product.size.map((size,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:size},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"price-label",children:"Price: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price-value",children:["$",product.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cart-button",onClick:handleAddToCart,children:"Add to Cart"})]})]});};export default ProductDetail;
